name: Sea Blue Phuket Guesthouse

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my bf stayed here for 2 nights in the jacuzzi room.
reviews.title: Nice Place

reviews.text: Room was clean and tidy, bed was a little hard but not too much of an issue. What I did find strange was we had no top sheet, just a very large towel and a throw.....
reviews.title: I loved it and I'll definitely be back

reviews.text: Hotel is located approx 10 mins good walk to Patong Beach and 5 mins walk to Bangla Road.
reviews.title: Excellent value, great staff, much more than a hostel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Close enough to everywhere without the noise.
reviews.title: Average place to stay

reviews.text: If you're travelling around Phuket and you need a cheap, clean, and an accessible place to crash, then Sea Blue Guesthouse is definitely your choice. The owner, a Canadian is the friendliest guy I've met in my entire journey in Phuket. I was telling him how I crave for some local delicacy and he just told me to hop on to his motorcycle and took me for a ride to a place to eat some authentic cheap Thai food for 50 baht!
reviews.title: great hostel cheap clean friendly staff

reviews.text: Stayed here for a week in April and was not dissapointed. The location is great with the night market just a few minutes walk, and the beach a 15 minute walk away. The dorm was clean and comfortable with air-con. Great price and great value!
reviews.title: Good Value, friendly Staff!

reviews.text: This place is a real gem! Located just outside town means nice and quiet place.
reviews.title: Best hostel in SE Asia trip!

reviews.text: Rooms are amazingly well done with big fridge, DVD player, tv with English channels, couch, book and great A/C. Big room large enough to spread your stuff out!
reviews.title: Job well done

reviews.text: Staff are very helpful and they are never pushy with tours!
reviews.title: Excellent Hostel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really enjoyed my stay in this lovely hostel. It really is a home away from home.
reviews.title: Good location, good price and a Jacuzzi in the room!

reviews.text: A 5 minute walk from the Jungceylon Mall if you are looking to shop or just cool down with some decent air-con. Internet cafes, 7-11, bars and restaurants are all on the same street as the hostel.
reviews.title: Good Value, very close to Jungceylon Mall

reviews.text: Close enough to walk to Bangla Road (5-10 mins) but far away enough to avoid most of the noise at night. (still some noise from clubs etc.)
reviews.title: GREAT SERVICE AND VERY CLEAN!

reviews.text: Curtains on bunk beds a nice touch for privacy/darkness to help you sleep.
reviews.title: Nice & clean room

reviews.text: Only stayed one night so don't have information. Seemed to have a lot of people partying hard, this could be a pro or con depending on your travel style. Lockers were available, provide your own lock for these.
reviews.title: ALL ROUND BEST VALUE

reviews.text: This is a excellent spot to base yourself in Patong, only 10 minute walk to the beach and all the bars. I first arrive in the dorm and that was the best dorm i had ever seen! Very, very clean and a good price. Later my boyfriend arrived and i booked a room with jacuzzi and that was great as well!! The Canadian owner is very helpfull (had an ear infection and he arranged a taxi to the best hospital). The atmosphere feels great out there and i can only be positive about this place! So book there and you'll have a great time......Kind regards Esmee from Holland.
reviews.title: clean, cheaper and nice staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Highly recommend this place. Large clean rooms and excellent location. We were lucky enough to have a Jacuzzi room for a little bit of luxury, but even the dormitory rooms are spacious and well appointed. The staff are excellent, friendly and couldn't be more helpful. And the location is great as well, just far enough from the hustle and bustle of Patong to get a good rest, but easy walking distance to the beach, shops and nightlife.
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay in Phuket

reviews.text: I had originally booked a 8 person dorm, but at my arrival they placed me in a 2 bed dorm... I guess they had over booked. I prefer this room and can stay here for the same price! Rooms have a/c, clean washroom, tv, DVD player and mini fridge!! Only down side: no common areas to meet others.
reviews.title: Super clean!! But no common area...

reviews.text: Sea Blue is an excellent guesthouse in Patong Beach, Phuket. It has a mix of dorm style rooms and private rooms, and I stayed in a private room for five nights in Jan 2011.
reviews.title: Excellent stay! One of the cleanest hotels I have ever been to!

reviews.text: The rooms themselves are large and well furnished compared to most guesthouses, with my room having adjustable and working AC, a full bar-sized fridge (with free bottles of water every day), a TV with about 50 channels, a siting area with an overstuffed chair, a balcony with table and two chairs, a large closet/drawers thing and a decent sized bed. The bathroom is what you'd expect, a western style toilet, a showerhead (with hot water!) from the wall, a sink and a mirror. Pretty damn good for $40 a night in the high season. And free wi-fi throughout too. That's also awesome.
reviews.title: You Should Stay Here When In Patong!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, the absolute best part of Sea Blue is that it is one of the cleanest hotels/hostels I have ever stayed in anywhere, even cleaner than most SPG or InterContinental Group properties worldwide. Every day the housekeeping staff came to clean, change the sheets and leave bottled water, with nary a spec of dust to be seen anywhere.
reviews.title: A real gem - amazing room and great location!

description: Sea Blue = Good prices, Clean Rooms, & Relaxed Atmosphere = Satisfaction! Now expanded to 18 rooms, because of great guest reviews. Thank you, Thank you! You have friends in Phuket. We claim to have the cleanest rooms in Phuket. Come experience our hotel for yourselves. We appreciate your business.
